class.name: velocity_controllers/JointVelocityController
class.description: The JointVelocityController tracks velocity commands. It expects a VelocityJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: velocity_controllers/JointPositionController
class.description: The JointPositionController converts position commands to velocity commands. It expects a VelocityJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: velocity_controllers/JointGroupVelocityController
class.description: The JointGroupVelocityController tracks velocity commands for a set of joints. It expects a VelocityJointInterface type of hardware interface.
